story_arceus_02_02000/2401_1101_0100_20: After the match, in the waiting area...
story_arceus_02_02000/2401_1001_0200_10:
My, my! I do believe that was one of the most
exciting battles we’ve had yet!
story_arceus_02_02000/2401_1001_0300_10:
It was an unfortunate result for you, but I’m sure
that next time...
story_arceus_02_02000/2401_1001_0600_10:
I’ll leave it to you, then, as the Champion’s
partner.
